question: [Practice] Espanol: Di which integer bin occurs most frequently segun el histograma.

qas.question: [Practice] Espanol: Di which integer bin occurs most frequently segun el histograma.
[Calm] Espanol: Di how many samples were used in total segun el histograma.
[Check] Polski: Podaj how many entries fall inside the modal bin na podstawie histogramu.
